SENT.plain: We report a 69-year-old man admitted in intensive care unit for aseptic meningoencephalitis
Initially, suspicion of an infectious etiology led to introduce an anti-infectious treatment
Behçet's disease was diagnosed during hospitalization incited to screen for noninfectious etiologies
A high dose steroid therapy was rapidly effective
The diagnosis of neuro-Behçet's disease was entertained
